alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 8:16PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ada, southwestern Boise and northwestern Elmore Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 815 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Boise, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Garden City and Bogus Basin Ski Area around 830 PM MDT. Eagle and Hidden Springs around 840 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
